title: MyParcel.com API Specification
description:
**Introduction**
This is the API reference for MyParcel.com implementing the [OpenApi 3.0 Specification](https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification) according to [JSON API](http://jsonapi.org) conventions.
For more information visit our [API documentation](https://docs.myparcel.com).

âš  Some endpoints are marked as experimental, which means their implementation might change within this major version.
**Units**
Some attributes in the API have values in one of the following units:
Currencycents/pence where applicable (eg. EUR, GBP, USD), otherwise the basic unit (eg. JPY, NOK)
Distancesmeters
Dimensionsmillimeters
Volumesliters (dm3)
Weightsgrams
